channel.title: Unusual Grunt AI on bm_c2a2c
channel.description:
In the video you can see the Grunt AI for this particular grunt is strange. He can clearly see me but refuses to shoot unless I'm in his immediate area.
[youtube.com/watch?v=l2OneeR ... e=youtu.be](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l2OneeRlMh0&feature=youtu.be)
